name: f1oeq2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c1, c3), wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c1, c3), wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c1, c3), wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wf1o(c0, c3, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))

comment: Equality deduction for one-to-one onto functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
